title: Manage your commercial vehicle operator licence online

details.description: Operator self service - online service for paying licence fees and making changes to goods or public service vehicle licence operator's licence
details.more_information:
To register for this service you’ll need either:

  • a current operator’s licence number
  • the reference number from your operator licence application

Once you’ve registered you’ll be sent a password in the post within a week. You can then start using the online service.

What you can do

You can:

  • view a summary of your operator licence records
  • change your address or trading name
  • apply to add or remove operating centre information
  • pay licence fees
  • add or remove vehicles
  • apply to increase or decrease the number of vehicles you’re authorised to operate
  • order duplicate operator licence discs
details.introduction: Pay your licence fees and make changes to your goods or public service vehicle (PSV) operator’s licence. You’ll need to register first to use this service.
